```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#create demographic variables
Stdt_Survey_ID <- c(1:8950)
School_Name <- sprintf("School %d",1:895)
School_District_Code <- c("001")
School_Geo <- c("1")
Student_Last <- c(rep("Doe",8950))
Student_First <- c(rep("Jane",8950))
Student_Middle <- c(rep("Test",8950))
Stdt_Dis_ID <- School_District_Code
Stdt_State_ID <- c(rep(29,8950))
Stdt_DOB_MM <- sample(1:12,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_DOB_DD <- sample(1:28,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_DOB_YYYY <- c(rep(2001,8950))
Stdt_EXIT_MM <- sample(1:12,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_EXIT_DD <- sample(1:28,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_EXIT_YYYY <- sample(2016:2020,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Primary_Dis <- sample(1:12,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Gender <- sample(1:3,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Race_Eth <- sample(1:7,8950,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Exit_Status <-sample(1:4,8950,replace=TRUE)
#
  
#I-14 Survey
#14.A
PSE_STATUS <- sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE)
PSE_TERM <- ifelse(PSE_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

#OSEP / NTACT's discrete categories may not be enough for PA's needs, we could add a 6th option for certificate programs (e.g., bootcamps, ect.) or more as needed.

PSE_PGRM <- ifelse(PSE_STATUS==2,sample(1:6,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

#14.B
EMPLY_STATUS <- sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE)

#the following variables combine to measure CIE
EMPLY_3MNTHs <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

EMPLY_20Hrs <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print (""))

EMPLY_WAGE <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

EMPLY_INTERACT <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

EMPLY_PROMO <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

COMPANY_NAME <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,"Example LLC.", print(""))

COMPANY_TYPE <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:8,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

CAREER_CLUSTER <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:16,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

EQUAL_COMP <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

BENEFITS <- ifelse(EMPLY_STATUS==2,sample(1:2,8950,replace=TRUE), print(""))

#I.14 Status
HigherEd <- if(PSE_STATUS==2 
               & PSE_STATUS==1
               | PSE_STATUS==2
               & PSE_PGRM==4){print(1)} else {print(0)}

CIE <- if(EMPLY_STATUS==2
          & !is.null(EMPLY_3MNTHs) 
          & !is.null(EMPLY_20Hrs) 
          & !is.null(EMPLY_WAGE) 
          & !is.null(EMPLY_INTERACT) 
          & !is.null(EMPLY_PROMO) 
          & (COMPANY_TYPE==1:5)
          & !is.null(EQUAL_COMP)
          & !is.null(BENEFITS)) {print(1)} else {print(0)}

OTHERPSE <- if(PSE_STATUS==2 
               & PSE_TERM==2 
               | PSE_PGRM==1
               | PSE_PGRM==2
               | PSE_PGRM==3
               | PSE_PGRM==5
               | PSE_PGRM==6) {print(1)} else {print(0)}

OTHEREMPLY <- if(EMPLY_STATUS==2
                 | EMPLY_3MNTHs==2
                 | EMPLY_20Hrs==2
                 | EMPLY_WAGE==2
                 | EMPLY_INTERACT==2
                 | EMPLY_PROMO==2
                 | COMPANY_TYPE==1:8
                 & EQUAL_COMP==1
                 & BENEFITS==1){print(1)} else {print(0)}

NOTENGAGED <- if(PSE_STATUS==1
                 & EMPLY_STATUS==1
                 & EMPLY_3MNTHs==1){print(1)} else {print(0)}

sampledata <- data.frame(
  School_Name,
  School_District_Code,School_Geo,
  Student_Last,
  Student_First,
  Student_Middle,
  Stdt_Dis_ID,
  Stdt_State_ID,
  Stdt_Survey_ID,
  Stdt_DOB_MM,
  Stdt_DOB_DD,
  Stdt_DOB_YYYY,
  Stdt_EXIT_MM,
  Stdt_EXIT_DD,
  Stdt_EXIT_YYYY,
  Stdt_Primary_Dis,
  Stdt_Gender,
  Stdt_Race_Eth,
  Stdt_Exit_Status,
  PSE_STATUS,
  PSE_TERM,
  PSE_PGRM,
  EMPLY_STATUS,
  EMPLY_3MNTHs,
  EMPLY_20Hrs,
  EMPLY_WAGE,
  EMPLY_INTERACT,
  EMPLY_PROMO,
  COMPANY_TYPE,
  EQUAL_COMP,
  BENEFITS
  )

#calculate percentages for 14 A, B and C

percentageA <- (sum(HigherEd)/sum(Stdt_Survey_ID))*100

percentageB <- ((sum(percentageA) + sum(CIE))/sum(Stdt_Survey_ID))*100

percentagec <- ((sum(percentageA) + sum(percentageB) + sum(OTHERPSE) + sum(OTHEREMPLY))/sum(Stdt_Survey_ID))*100

percentage_notengaged <- ((sum(Stdt_Survey_ID) - percentagec) / Stdt_Survey_ID)*100 

```
